description.narrative: By the end of 2019, a national and state-level special protection system exists to prevent, address and restore - in an integrated manner across sectors and branches of government - the rights of children and adolescents that have been violated, with special attention to those violations related to migration, institutionalization, violence - especially gender-based violence- and discrimination.

mailing-address.narrative: Paseo de la Reforma 645 Col. Lomas de Chapultepec México D.F. 11000

ECD data, evidence, and knowledge generation and dissemination
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Social welfare workforce systems strengthening (accreditation, staffing and supervision)

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities policy, planning and administration

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2019, a national and state-level special protection system exists to prevent, address and restore - in an integrated manner across sectors and branches of government - the rights of children and adolescents that have been violated, with special attention to those violations related to migration, institutionalization, violence - especially gender-based violence- and discrimination.

description.narrative: UNICEF Mexico focused on strengthening the child protection workforce to ensure a coordinated response to cases of violence and abuse. In the particular case of gender-based violence (GBV), UNICEF Mexico focused on violence prevention strategies and integrated response services as part of the Spotlight Initiative. To respond to the ongoing migrant crisis, UNICEF Mexico has pushed for the alternative care agenda in the country. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of children on the move who receive protective services through UNICEF-supported programs

title.narrative: Status of national guidelines, protocols or standard operating procedures (SOPs) for the health system?s response to sexual violence against children (including adolescents), consistent with WHO guidelines and international human rights standards.

baseline.value: Current efforts do not have a specific focus on children or are isolated

target.value: 2018:1 Manual on the prevention, detection and referral of cases of violence against children

title.narrative: Existencia de una comisin de proteccin especial en el marco del SIPINNA y de los Sistemas Locales.

baseline.value: No existe la comisin de proteccin especial en el marco del SIPINNA.

target.value: 2019:En 2018 existe una comisi¿n a de protecci¿n especial en el SIPINNA y en los Sistemas de los 32 Sistemas Locales.

actual.value: 2020:Continúa la Comisión de protección especial en el marco del SIPINNA a nivel nacional (Creada en 2016) En 2019 funcionan 6 comisiones de protección especial en los SIPINNAS Estatales Continúan trabajando las comisiones de protección especial de Chapas, Nuevo León, Jalisco y Durango y se crea

title.narrative: Un sistema de referencias y de responsabilidades profesionales es establecido, con sensibilidad de gnero, en respuesta a la violencia, el abuso, explotacin y negligencia contra nios, nias y adolescentes en todos los sectores en contacto con la infancia y la adolescencia.

target.value: 2019:Sistema de referencias y responsabilidades profesionales establecido mediante protocolos de procedimientos, con sensibilidad de género, en respuesta a la violencia, el abuso, explotación y negligencia

actual.value: 2020:Están en funcionamiento las 32 Procuradurías Estatales y la Procuraduría Federal de Protección y 1016 Procuradurías Municipales, Delegaciones Municipales y Subprocuradurías.
